pages.text: The goal of the first simulation is to produce$(br)$(item)Steel$().$(br2)A task that can seem daunting at first, but fret not this manual will guide you through the process.

pages.title: Steel
pages.text: $(item)Steel$() can be produced using an $(item)Improved Blast Furnace$(), so most of the tasks in this chapter will bring us closer to being able to make one of those.
